scripts.build: tsb -p tsconfig.build.json && node tools/packager.js && npm run rollup-all && npm pack ./dist
scripts.Xbuild: npm run rollup-all && node buildpkg.js && cd build && npm pack
scripts.clean: rimraf temp && rimraf src/*.js* && rimraf src/*.d.ts && rimraf build/*.js* && rimraf build/*.tgz && rimraf dist
scripts.typedoc: typedoc --out ./temp/docs/ --exclude xx  --excludePrivate --excludeNotExported  --tsConfig ./tsconfig.typedoc.json --mode file --readme ./readme.doc.md ./src/breeze.ts && node rollup/copyIfDifferent.js temp/docs docs
scripts.Xrollup-full: npm run rollup -- -c ./rollup/rollup.full.js && npm run tsc-es5 -- --out build/breeze.debug.js temp/breeze.full.es2015.js && npm run minify -- --output build/breeze.min.js build/breeze.debug.js
scripts.rollup-base: rollup -c ./rollup/rollup.base.js && npm run tsc-es5 -- --out dist/bundles/breeze-client.umd.js temp/breeze.base.es2015.js && npm run minify -- --output dist/bundles/breeze-client.umd.min.js dist/bundles/breeze-client.umd.js
scripts.rollup-all: npm run tsc-2015 && npm run rollup-base && npm run rollup-adapters
